title: I fly from ILM to PHL several times a year and I have found that USAir is now using smaller aircraft. My trip last Thursday and return today was full on a 50 passenger plane. I have checked ILM to LGA and the same thing. Why has USAir changed to smaller planes? These smaller planes go to a concourse where you have to take a bus to the main terminal...what a pain!!! I hope USAir has a darn good explanation for this!!!
